definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: You may also inhale oils directly from the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以直接從精油瓶中吸入精油。

sentences.english: You may also inhale oils directly from the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以直接從精油瓶中吸入精油。

sentences.english: Organic essential oils of fennel, bergamot, verbena and cedarwood essential oils.
sentences.chinese: 茴香，佛手柑，馬鞭草，雪松等有機單方精油。

sentences.english: What is the function of Ohh! Natural Pest Control Collar?
sentences.chinese: 天然精油驅蚤頸圈的功能？

sentences.english: The blend of Eucalyptus, Menthol and Tea Tree Oil helps Prevent foot odor and bacterial contamination.
sentences.chinese: 內含薄荷和茶樹精油，有助於防止腳臭和細菌污染。

sentences.english: Have picked the right use, diet, massage, essential oils, flower month Ting.
sentences.chinese: 選對了就有用，食療，按摩，精油，花月婷。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyze the chemical constituents of the essential oil from the flowers of Meconopsis integrifolia in Tibet.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究藏藥全緣葉綠絨蒿花精油的化學成分。

sentences.english: Scented with the refreshing aroma of organic Bergamot essential oil.
sentences.chinese: 有機佛手柑精油的香氣令人有清爽之感。

sentences.english: Another way to avoid fake oils is to shop with blotting paper.
sentences.chinese: 避免買到假精油的方法還有利用吸墨紙來鑑別。

sentences.english: Patchouli essential oil can also be good for a variety of skincare treatments.
sentences.chinese: 廣霍香精油對各種皮膚保養問題的治療也很好。

sentences.english: Litsea cubeba is an important export essential oil resources plant in China.
sentences.chinese: 精油植物山雞椒是我國重要外銷精油資源植物。

sentences.english: Litsea cubeba is an important export essential oil resources plant in China.
sentences.chinese: 精油植物山雞椒是我國重要外銷精油資源植物。

sentences.english: For burns or scalds , drop Tea Tree oil directly on the effected area.
sentences.chinese: 在燒傷或燙傷後，直接滴茶樹精油在創口部位。

sentences.english: Pour water into a two quart glass bowl and mix in essential oils.
sentences.chinese: 倒入2夸脫玻璃碗裏的水和精油混合。

sentences.english: There are much safrole in eight sorts of Cinnamomum Trew plants' ethereal oil.
sentences.chinese: 在八種樟屬植物精油中含有較多的黃樟素。

sentences.english: Neroli was once an oil heavily used in embalming those who were mummified in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 橙花曾是一種在古代大量用於給木乃伊塗香油的精油。
